```tsx
import React from 'react';
import { Button, ButtonGroup } from '@elements/react';

function Example() {
  return (
    <wj-button-group>
      <wj-button>Start</wj-button>
      <wj-button>Center</wj-button>
      <wj-button>End</wj-button>
    </wj-button-group>
  );
}
export default Example;
```
